notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Gustaf Eriksen to Gustaf Petersen: Berteau Avenue and Lincoln Street. Price, $3,800.
C. M. Bent to Ida F. Strand: Evanston Avenue [Broadway] and Addison Boulevard. Price, $12,800.
Charles G. Lindblom to Sven Carlson: Newport Avenue and Herndon Street. Price, $8,500.
J. L. Corchoran to Anton A. Molm: Norwood and Southport Avenues. Price, $1,400.
Carl A. Anderson to Charles A. Norem: 909 Clive Avenue. Price, $3,750.
Mary C. to Charles A. Carlson: and Halsted Streets. Price, $6,800.
Charles M. Anderson to M. McRoberts: Sheffield Avenue and Grace Street. Price, $23,000.
Washington Park Club to Anton M. Andersen: Evans Avenue and 61st Street. Price, $1,275.
Charles Lindquist to Victor : Fifth Avenue and Garfield Boulevard. Price, $3,900.
C. Fagust to Anton Petersen: and 63rd Streets. Price, $1,000.
Olaf Oak to Olaf Soderland: Avenue and 69th Street. Price, $1.
Caroline to Charles A. Andersen: 111th Street and Eleventh Avenue. Price, $5,000.
Emely Olsen to Sandstrom: Le Street and Avenue. Price, $10,000.
